You are given a user review to a(n) pants product and an aspect covered in the review. 
Please extract the keyphrase from the review that mentions the given aspect. 
You should only extract ONLY ONE keyphrase from the review. 
You should not generate new keyphrases that do not exist in the review.
Do not give explanations or irrelevant text. Generate short keyphrases, not whole sentences.  
Review: Love these pants. Super comfortable.  They run longer than what  I am use to, but I think that is part of the style. Bought in two other colors. As for sizing, I normally wear a 34/30 to 36/30 depending on the manufacturer. I am 5'11 215 with an athletically build.
Aspect: comfort
Output:

You are given a user review to a(n) shorts product and an aspect covered in the review. 
Please extract the keyphrase from the review that mentions the given aspect. 
You should only extract ONLY ONE keyphrase from the review. 
You should not generate new keyphrases that do not exist in the review.
Do not give explanations or irrelevant text. Generate short keyphrases, not whole sentences.  
Review: These shoes are soft and comfortable but slightly snug.  I can wear them now if not doing a lot of walking, but they are lather and will stretch a little, so I'm happy with them.  They are a great color, sort of stone.  Not white and not beige.  Very versatile.
Aspect: comfort
Output:

The following is a user review to a(n) water cup product and an aspect mentioned in the review.
Please extract the keyphrase from the review that mentions the given aspect. 
You should only extract ONLY ONE keyphrase from the review. 
You should not generate new keyphrases that do not exist in the review.
Do not give explanations or irrelevant text. Generate short keyphrases, not whole sentences.  
Review: Perfect size for a couple of large water bottles and some ice packs. I see that a few reviewers commented on how hard the lid was to open, I can't speak to their experiences, but mine works just fine.. I am going to LOVE this thing for strapping onto my atv for work. I don't drink much soda, so a few water bottles and a small lunch in mine and I am all set.
Aspect: ease of use
Output:

You are given a user review to a(n) shirt product and an aspect covered in the review. 
Please extract the keyphrase from the review that mentions the given aspect. 
You should only extract ONLY ONE keyphrase from the review. 
You should not generate new keyphrases that do not exist in the review.
Do not give explanations or irrelevant text. Generate short keyphrases, not whole sentences.  
Review: I bought this for my 8 year old daughter and I got a Medium.  She is small for her age but I would normally buy her a size 7.  But since the only options were small medium and large, and after reading the reviews, I went with a medium.  It is way way too big.  I should have gone with a small or XS.  So I am disappointed because she is going to wear it for pictures.  Instead of sending it back, I'll just have to cut and sew it myself. The colors are really bright and it's a pretty nice shirt.  It could be a little thicker though in my opinion.
Aspect: color
Output:

Instructions: Evaluate the following product review on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being very negative and 5 being very positive. 
Input: a review text for a(n) Thermometer product
This unit works well, but the temp is approximately 4 degrees lower than actual temp. which is annoying.  The other two thermometers in my house were put next to this unit and they read consistent with each other but ~4 degrees hotter.  Not sure why the company can't make it so it reads a true temp.  However, the unit does work and fits my needs.
Output:
Answer:

Instructions: Evaluate the following product review on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being very negative and 5 being very positive. 
Input: a review text for a(n) cereal product
I love this Meusli. Its very simple. Im sure I could mix up my own, but its easier to just scoop it out for use.  I haven't tried cooking it. I usually put it in a bowl with a little almond milk and let it sit for about 10 minutes, which I think is what the package directions say. Id like to try cooking it sometime.  Its very good. Its currently my favorite cereal and, I think, much better for you than other packaged breakfast cereals.
Output:
Answer:

Given the following product, which of the following keyword sets is most suitable for it?
Product Title: Alchemy Power Inc. Pi-EzConnect – Raspberry Pi GPIO Verbinder. Eine Kappe um GPIOs und Sensoren zu einem Raspberry Pi zu verbinden. Inkl. MwSt.
Product Description: Vor dem Pi-EzConnect werden ein Flachbandkabel, ein Steckbrett und andere Drähte verwendet, um den Temperatursensor mit dem Raspberry-Pi zu verbinden. Mit dem Pi-Ezconnect, wird die Verbindung wie gezeigt vereinfacht. Sehen Sie das Video auf You Tube – https://youtu.be/oChXSE0etQw an. Sowohl der 3,3 V als auch der 5 V Strom ist auf Pi-EzConnect verfügbar. Es gibt auch eine Stromerdung auf Ppi-EzConnect. Elektronische Geräte, wie z.B. "Pull-up oder Pull-Down - Resistors, LEDs oder andere Komponenten können leicht in die Pi-EzConnect Lötstellen gelegt werden. Sensoren können auch auf Lötpunkte verlötet werden. Verwenden Sie abwechselnd die mitgelieferten Lötverbindungen. Erweiterte Header Pins erlauben Verbindung anderen Kappen mit dem Pi-EzConnect ohne Verlust an Funktionalität. Zur Montage der Pi-EzConnect-Platine auf dem Raspberry-Pi verwenden Sie den 2,5 mm x 15 mm Messing-Abstandshalter für Raspberry Pi HATs. Funktioniert z.B. mit 40 Pin- Header Raspberry Pi Pi-2, Pi-3 sowie Orange-Pi, DIGI ConnectCore und anderen Computern, die das 40 Pin HAT- Format folgen.

0. erweiterung, gpio, breakout board, raspberry pi
1. arzt, raspberry pi, gpio, klemmleiste
2. besteckkasten, raspberry pi, gpio, leicht
3. t cobbler, bett, klemmleiste, learning resource
Answer:

Product Title: Câbles séparateur NANYI XLR à 3.5mm, câble de microphone audio d'interconnexion mâle TRS stéréo vers deux XLR mâles, câble adaptateur de séparateur Y   (0.5 mètres / 1.6 pieds)
Product Description: Câble XLR de qualité professionnelle Diffusez de la musique de votre smartphone ou de votre ordinateur sur des haut-parleurs pour une fête ou pour une console de mixage numérique pour une performance. Ce câble complet a un PVC souple veste pour une utilisation facile et le stockage. Les connecteurs métalliques robustes sont plaqués or contacts afin de réduire le moulage par oxydation et décharge de traction sur le connecteur XLR maintenir l'intégrité du câble. Les conducteurs en cuivre sans oxygène sont enfermés à nu blindage en tresse de cuivre pour fournir un son pur et sans bruit. Caractéristiques: 1. Le câble XLR NANYI associe des canaux stéréo TRS de 3,5 mm à une alimentation monoRo XLR. 2. Adaptabilité élevée, fiches XLR sophistiquées de 3,5 mm et 3 broches pour plus d'équipements et d'applications. 3. Le boîtier de prise XLR pour la peinture en aérosol noire polie de moulage sous pression en alliage de zinc de haute résistance, attrayant et durable. 4. Fiche 3,5 mm plaquée or pour une meilleure conductivité et une meilleure clarté du signal. 5. Cuivre sans oxygène de qualité supérieure (OFC) pour un rejet et une flexibilité efficaces des EMI et des RFI. Paquet: Câble micro mâle de 3,5 mm à 2 xlr de 0,5 mètre * 1 Garantie: 12 mois 1. Le câble XLR NANYI associe des canaux stéréo TRS de 3,5 mm à une alimentation monoRo XLR.

Given the following product, which of the following keyword sets is most suitable for it?
Product Title: bonmedico Rialzo per Sedia Portatile, Cuscino a Cuneo Ergonomico Ideale Come Cuscino da Divano e Cuscino per Sedia da Ufficio – Alzasedia Perfetto Come Cuscino per Sedia a Rotelle
Product Description: Alzasedia bonmedico – ergonomico, innovativo e incredibilmente versatile  Il cuscino da seduta bonmedico, realizzato in una schiuma innovativa e con sporgenze antiscivolo. Sia a casa che a lavoro, potrai usare questo cuscino ergonomico per la tua sedia da ufficio o per la poltrone in salotto. La forma a cuneo e l’altezza lo rendono perfetto per alzarsi più facilmente.  La forma ergonomica del nostro cuscino a cuneo lo rende perfetto per sedersi per lunghi periodi. La schiuma innovativa non si adatterà solamente al peso del tuo corpo, ma ti garantirà un appoggio per rialzarti comodamente. La federa è realizzata in velluto di alta qualità e ha una piacevole sensazione al tatto. Con questo supporto universale potrai rendere più comoda qualsiasi sedia e vivere meglio. È ideale per sedie da tv, poltrone e divani bassi e può essere persino utilizzato come comodissimo cuscino per sedia a rotelle. Sarai a tuo agio ovunque e in qualsiasi situazione.  La forma ergonomica a cuneo e le sporgenze antiscivolo garantiscono una tenuta sicura anche sulle superfici lisce. Il manico integrato e le pratiche dimensioni lo rendono comodissimo da portare in giro.   Potrai rimuovere facilmente la federa grazie alla cerniera nella parte posteriore. Il materiale in velluto può essere lavato in lavatrice a 60°C e tutti i materiali utilizzati sono atossici.     ✔ DESIGN INTELLIGENTE: I nostri cuscini per sedie hanno una forma ergonomica e sporgenze antiscivolo che ne garantiranno la stabilità anche sulle superfici lisce. Ogni cuscino per sedia è dotato di un comodo manico e le sue pratiche dimensioni di 40 cm x 40 cm x 13/8 cm (larghezza x spessore x altezza) lo rendono facilissimo da trasportare. Avrai finalmente il cuscino da ufficio che sognavi.

2. ergonomico, sedie, antidecubito, memory
3. vasca, foam, sedia, seduta
Answer:
